text: Jesus said to him, “I tell you assuredly that you, today, this very night, before a rooster crows twice,For a full discussion of Peter's denials, harmonizing all four accounts, please see the Appendix: How often did Jesus say Peter would deny Him? I argue that this is the fourth warning, and since Peter became increasingly belligerent and disrespectful, Jesus added a second crowing preceded by another three denials. you will deny me three times.”
